description:
Our family favourite Colgate Triple Action Toothpaste with 3 way action is formulated with extra micro cleaning minerals. Providing cavity protection, whiter teeth and fresh breath benefits.

Ready to Smile.

We know that giving your family every opportunity is important to you.

That's why we're here to give them a smile that’s ready to take on the world - with cavity  protection, whiter teeth and fresh breath, so they'll always be prepared with their best smiles.

Colgate Triple Action Toothpaste is:
- Vegan
- Sugar free
- Gluten free

We've switched to a recyclable tube (does not include cap). Follow local council guidelines for recycling HDPE 2 plastics or recycle with Terracycle.

Size: 165g
Format: Paste

EFFECTIVE CLEAN: With extra micro cleaning minerals for an effective clean

THREE WAY ACTION: Colgate Triple Action Toothpaste provides cavity protection, whiter teeth and fresh breath

CAVITY PROTECTION: Fluoride formula helps prevent cavities on teeth

FRESH BREATH: Original mint flavour freshens breath

SIZE & FORMAT: Colgate Triple Action toothpaste comes in a 165g recyclable toothpaste tube and paste format.
name: Colgate Triple Action With Extra Micro Cleaning Minerals 165g
